cast.name: 托马斯·西梅卡 Thomas Scimeca

writer.name: 塞巴斯蒂安·贝蓓德 Sébastien Betbeder

director.name: 塞巴斯蒂安·贝蓓德 Sébastien Betbeder

introduction: Thomas, a freelance journalist at Le Courrier Picard who is profiling Usé, an unusual musician and a former candidate for the local elections in Amiens. As they are getting to know each other a little better, they stumble upon the lifeless body of Jojo, who comes back to life before their very eyes. Their lives are then turned upside down…
